name: @rahimalizada/ngx-common
description: Common library. Includes base model files. includes a base abstract service for REST services and related angular resolvers/interceptors. Includes generic JWT authentication services. Includes external script loader for angular projects. Includes a collection of Angular pipes. Includes a collection of Angular validators. Includes an Angular interceptor that adds a launch mode header to PWAs. Includes shared components for working with angular forms. Includes a directive for enabling/disabling an element indicating http/navigation progress.
